title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs Authorisation
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorisation. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorisation means being allowed to access the system.

title: Object Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL (via Sequelize)!.
